title: The Story of Alexander Stonebridge
description: Sometimes lifelong enemies can make the best of friends... or even more.This is the story of Alexander Stonebridge and his struggle to come to terms with his sexuality. His only friend in the world Ben likes to use homophobic slurs, and Alexander (Alex) doesn't know how much longer he can keep his sexuality a secret. Patrick Blake, Alex's longtime family rival complicates things further for Alex when the two start hanging out, and Alex's feelings grow stronger and more confusing. Alex and Patrick must overcome hatred, bigotry, and their own fears to finally find their kindred spirit. Follow Alex on his journey to find himself, and learn the true meaning of love.
author: Noah Twain
